resources.string: Arya Stark\nThird child of Eddard and Catelyn Stark and the Owner of this application. She swore revenge on those who killed her family. Trained in Braavos, she is a furious assassin. She will kill everyone in her list and will not rest till she do so.

Brandon Stark\n Second son of Eddard and Catelyn Stark. He is sweet and thoughtful boy loved by everyone in Winterfell. His favourite activities include climbing walls and ramant of castle. But unfortunately lost his legs in a tragic accident. He has powers to control animals accordingto his will.
Catelyn Stark\n Wife of Eddard Stark.
Iron Throne\n The central point of game of thrones.
John Snow\n commander of night\'s watch
Robb Stark\n Eldest son of Ned Stark and King in the north.
Sansa Stark\n Eldest Daughter of Ned Stark.
Night King\n The king of white walkers, zombies who control the dead and wakes up only in winter.
Dragon\n One of the last three 3 remaining.
